course_title: Accounting for Business Combinations and Multinational Operations
class_notes: The delivery format listed for this class is based on current university guidelines.  However, if there are further changes to the COVID19 guidelines for Fall 2021 or other acts beyond our control, the school reserves the right the modify the delivery method for this class.
course_description: Financial reporting and analysis of complex business combinations and multinational operations. Topics include mergers and acquisitions, joint ventures and partnerships, noncontrolling interests, variable interest entities, consolidated financial statements, pushdown accounting, foreign currency transactions, financial derivatives, foreign subsidiaries, and business and geographic segments.
